fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Visit someone at night, giving them a piece of candy.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players can eat their candy during the night to be healed and purged.
- Players are notified they have candy.
- Once you die, you pop. After 1 day/night cycle, come back to life. You will have full immunity the phase you come back. You can only pop/come back to life once.
- The first night after you pop, everyone will be targeted by a random ability from a random role. The ability will not kill.
